languages.text: "За тобой тоже охотились. Помнишь нашу встречу на Райкаде Минорис и людей, выдававших себя за еретиков?"
"You were hunted too. Remember our meeting on Rykad Minoris and the people who posed as heretics?"
languages.original_text: "За тобой тоже охотились. Помнишь нашу встречу на Райкаде Минорис и людей, выдававших себя за еретиков?"

traits.locale_text: "You were hunted too. Remember our meeting on Rykad Minoris and the people who posed as heretics?"
"You were hunted too. Remember our meeting on Rykad Minoris and the people who posed as heretics?"
"You were hunted too. Remember our meeting on Rykad Minoris and the people who posed as heretics?"
"You were hunted too. Remember our meeting on Rykad Minoris and the people who posed as heretics?"
"You were hunted too. Remember our meeting on Rykad Minoris and the people who posed as heretics?"

languages.text: “你也曾遭到过追杀。你还记得我们在小莱卡德见面的情况吧？还有那些冒充异端分子的人。”
languages.original_text: "You were hunted too. Remember our meeting on Rykad Minoris and the people who posed as heretics?"

traits.locale_text: “你也曾遭到过追杀。你还记得我们在小莱卡德见面的情况吧？还有那些冒充异端分子的人。”

languages.text: «A usted también lo perseguían. ¿Recuerda nuestro encuentro en Rykad Minoris, a la gente que fingía ser un grupo de herejes?».
languages.original_text: "You were hunted too. Remember our meeting on Rykad Minoris and the people who posed as heretics?"

traits.locale_text: «A uste también lo perseguían. ¿Recuerda nuestro encuentro en Rykad Minoris, a la gente que fingía ser un grupo de herejes?».

languages.text: 「お前も追われていただろう。ライカド・ミノリスでの出会いと、異端者を装っていた者たちを覚えているか？」
languages.original_text: "You were hunted too. Remember our meeting on Rykad Minoris and the people who posed as heretics?"

traits.locale_text: 「お前も追われていただろう。ライカド・ミノリスでの出会いと、異端者を装っていた者たちを覚えているか？」

languages.text: "Ihr wurdet auch gejagt. Erinnert Ihr Euch an unser Treffen auf Rykad Minoris und die Leute, die sich als Ketzer ausgegeben haben?"
languages.original_text: "You were hunted too. Remember our meeting on Rykad Minoris and the people who posed as heretics?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wurdet auch gejagt. Erinnert Ihr Euch an unser Treffen auf Rykad Minoris und die Leute, die sich als Ketzer ausgegeben haben?"

languages.text: « Vous aussi, vous avez été traqué. Vous rappelez-vous notre rencontre sur Rykad Minoris et les gens qui se faisaient passer pour des hérétiques ? »
languages.original_text: "You were hunted too. Remember our meeting on Rykad Minoris and the people who posed as heretics?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous aussi, vous avez été traqué. Vous rappelez-vous notre rencontre sur Rykad Minoris et les gens qui se faisaient passer pour des hérétiques ? »

languages.text: "Sen de hedefmişsin. Rykad Minoris'teki karşılaşmamızı ve kâfir gibi davranan insanları hatırlıyor musun?"
languages.original_text: "You were hunted too. Remember our meeting on Rykad Minoris and the people who posed as heretics?"

traits.locale_text: "Sen de bir hedeftin. Rykad Minoris'teki karşılaşmamızı ve kâfir gibi davranan insanları hatırlıyor musun?"
